description: This file defines an ApiClient class that provides HTTP request methods (GET and POST) to interact with backend services, utilizing environment variables for configuration and incorporating debugging logs.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods to perform HTTP GET and POST requests, managing base URL and request configuration.

methods.name: ApiClient._
methods.description: Private constructor initializing the ApiClient instance with a base URL.

methods.name: ApiClient.instance
methods.description: Getter providing singleton access to the ApiClient instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _uri
methods.description: Constructs a Uri object with given path and optional query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to a specified path with optional query parameters.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to a specified path with an optional body.
